page.post_content:
Join our La Famiglia VIP program and claim your special complimentary birthday Bonus from our family to yours! Book a table during your birthday month for -
  • 7% OFF your total bill
  • A FREE Cannoli tower birthday cake
Simply fill in the form below and we’ll do the rest.  
TERMS & CONDITIONS
    • Reservations are essential.
    • A deposit of $250.00 must be made online through our website
    • Bonus is valid for one standard cannoli tower per booking and 7% discount for VIP members only.
    • A minimum spend of $300.00 must be met in order to receive your complimentary cake.
    • Reservations must be made & confirmed 48 hours prior the booking date.
    • Not valid with any other offer, discount or promotion.
    • Any extras are charged at an additional cost.
    • A minimum of 8 guests and maximum of 11 is required to be eligible for the Bonus.
    • Provisions for free items are always subject to availability.
    • Criniti's reserves the right to make changes to the VIP bday Bonus at any time without notice.
    • Bonus must be claimed within your birthday month (allowing for a few days grace either side of the date).
    • Bonus is only valid for the VIP customer plus two-family members on the account under the age of 12.
    • The Bonus can only be redeemed once a year.
page.content:
Join our La Famiglia VIP program and claim your special complimentary birthday Bonus from our family to yours!

Book a table during your birthday month for –

  • 7% OFF your total bill
  • A FREE Cannoli tower birthday cake

Simply fill in the form below and we’ll do the rest.

 

TERMS & CONDITIONS

    • Reservations are essential.
    • A deposit of $250.00 must be made online through our website
    • Bonus is valid for one standard cannoli tower per booking and 7% discount for VIP members only.
    • A minimum spend of $300.00 must be met in order to receive your complimentary cake.
    • Reservations must be made & confirmed 48 hours prior the booking date.
    • Not valid with any other offer, discount or promotion.
    • Any extras are charged at an additional cost.
    • A minimum of 8 guests and maximum of 11 is required to be eligible for the Bonus.
    • Provisions for free items are always subject to availability.
    • Criniti’s reserves the right to make changes to the VIP bday Bonus at any time without notice.
    • Bonus must be claimed within your birthday month (allowing for a few days grace either side of the date).
    • Bonus is only valid for the VIP customer plus two-family members on the account under the age of 12.
    • The Bonus can only be redeemed once a year.

acf.sub_title: let's celebrate the finer things - you
acf.header_title: Italian Restaurant - Sydney, Newcastle & Melbourne | Criniti’s
acf.header_description: Authentic Italian wood fired pizza and pasta in Sydney, Newcastle, & Melbourne. With a range of dishes from pizza & pasta, steaks & burgers, to fresh seafood & gourmet salads. Lunch, Dinner, Dessert and Cocktails!
acf.header_keywords: pizza, pasta, Italian, Italian cuisine, take away, restaurant, lunch, dinner, dessert, coffee, drinks, cocktails, steak, seafood, gluten free, spaghetti, best Italian, birthday dinner, Sydney, Parramatta, darling harbour, darling harbour, castle hill, Newcastle, functions
